data.name: Racket Fury: Table Tennis VR
data.description:
ADVANCED PHYSICS:
We spent countless hours on developing our own physics from scratch and tweaking it with professional table tennis players. Based on scientific research, it’s extremely realistic and translates your moves in the most accurate manner.

MULTIPLAYER & ONLINE RANKING:
Challenge the players from every corner of the world and defeat them with your smart strategy and unbeatable technique.

SINGLEPLAYER EXPERIENCE:
You’re about to face 16 opponents in the singleplayer campaign. Beware! The higher the Cup, the more demanding and troublesome it gets!

ARCADE & SIMULATION MODES
Decide for yourself whether you wish to obtain the most accurate or the most entertaining table tennis experience!

BEAUTIFUL SCENERIES
Choose one of 5 amazing sceneries and decide whether you wish to play in daylight or at night!

MOTION CAPTURE ANIMATIONS:
To deliver the most realistic characters’ movements, we relied upon motion capture data for our animations.

changelog.change_log: - 120Hz Support Update! (Enable via Oculus Experimental Settings, after that 120Hz Enable option will appear in the Racket Fury Video Settings)
- 120Hz Support Update! (Enable via Oculus Experimental Settings, after that 120Hz Enable option will appear in the Racket Fury Video Settings)
- 120Hz Support Update! (Enable via Oculus Experimental Settings, after that 120Hz Enable option will appear in the Racket Fury Video Settings)

- 90Hz mode support for Quest2
- Fixed black screen issue on Quest1 (Final fix)

- 90Hz mode for Quest 2 
- Fixed game crash on Quest 1 (7.0.5 version)

- 90Hz mode for Quest 2
- Fixed game crash on Quest 1
- 90Hz mode for Oculus Quest 2 support

- Fixed not being able to spawn ball in multiplayer matches bug
- Fixed cross-platform online issue with Steam users
- Other improvements

New point logic system
Fixed multiplayer point logic issues

Fixed multiplayer ball spawning issue
Fixed multiplayer point logic issue
Resetting multiplayer ready status after game mode change
Many more improvements

- Illegal serves FIX
- Higher (and severe) penalties for deliberately leaving the match
- 20 sec time limit for a serve in multiplayer (counter beside the table)
- New Black/Red racket available :table_tennis_paddle_and_ball:
- The problem with post-match buttons - solved 
- Clear information about season’s last hours (even minutes!)
- Leaderboards reset fix
- Direct Match Rooms scrolling fix
- Some minor bugs’ fixes :-)

- Leaderboards Seasons ( Ranking reset every month)
- Online Play - Penalty for leaving during the session
- Social Rich Presence (you can join friend online play via Oculus app)
Fixed ranking score bug

- Updated to the newest Oculus SDK 1.40
- Fixed maximum 23 level bug which blocks from progressing
- Tweaks in Ranking System logic(you will get at least 2 points if you win the match)

- Ranking System!
- Separate Ranking for Arcade& Simulation
- Friend List Ranking Info
- Four Profile buttons in Main Menu
- Improved paddle velocity calculation
- Added Supersampling 1.3 & 1.4 options
- Improved Net physics
- Different colors for Simulation and Arcade
- Minor fixes as usual

- Fixed Online Ranking Screen Bug
